nodes.text: Brom was a male information broker who worked for the droid manufacturer Cybot Galactica. At some point, he and his partner Bim Gizzo attempted to plant a datacard belonging to their employer's rival, Industrial Automaton, onto a patron at the cantina the Sleeping Rancor. A pair of Industrial Automaton security personnel then arrived looking for the card and a fight ensued. During the fight Brom shot a sleeping Ronto outside the bar, which then when on rampage, causing significant damage to the cantina.
